references.paper_title: Redmark: Framework for residual diffusion watermarking based on deep networks
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel framework for residual diffusion watermarking, a technique relevant to the paper's focus on robust and imperceptible watermarking methods.
This early work on combined DWT-DCT watermarking provides a foundational technique that is compared against the proposed method in the paper.
This paper addresses image manipulation detection, a critical aspect of watermarking robustness that is directly relevant to the paper's approach.

references.paper_title: A dct-domain system for robust image watermarking
references.reason: This foundational paper on DCT-domain watermarking is important because it represents a widely used and well-established technique against which the proposed method is compared.

references.paper_title: Geometrically invariant watermarking using feature points
references.reason: This paper on geometrically invariant watermarking is relevant because it tackles the challenge of watermark robustness against geometric transformations, which is also addressed in the current work.
